@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds support for verification of infrastructure requirements to unit test classes.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Verifies a list of infrastructure requirements by checking for corresponding "has" methods. If no such method was found, {@link qx.core.Environment} will be checked for a key matching the given feature name. Note that asynchronous environment checks are not supported!

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if no valid check was found for a feature.
@throws.description: if no valid check was found for a feature.
